TextBlock.Text: SENNETTI: Goodness, Okalis was not lying when he remarked that there is a terrible beast in this area. That anglerfish is massive!

SENNETTI: Fortunately, it seems that the creature is thoroughly domesticated, so it should be no real threat. From what I can gather, this fish is the mother of all of the other fish domesticated by the Dree.
SENNETTI: Really, it should be glad that the Dree look after it. With its massive size, I'm certain it would starve without them feeding it!
